xMatixPlatform.title: For CIOs & CTOs
xMatixPlatform.description1: CIOs and CTOs are under pressure to modernise operations, enable AI, and support faster change â€” all while maintaining stability, security, and governance. Legacy CRM and ERP systems are slow to adapt, while point solutions add complexity. xMatix provides a single execution layer that enables incremental modernisation, unified data, and governed automation without replacing core systems.

whatIsIt.title: How xMatix Helps
whatIsIt.description2: xMatix acts as a system of execution that sits above existing systems of record. Built on the xMatix Platform, Data Fabric, and Sense, it enables CIOs and CTOs to modernise execution incrementally, unify operational data, and introduce autonomous workflows while maintaining enterprise-grade governance and control.

cardLayoutData.title: How {{highlight}} CIOs and CTOs modernise execution {{/highlight}} with xMatix
cardLayoutData.description: xMatix enables a phased, low-risk approach to modernisation by separating execution from record-keeping and enabling continuous improvement.

features.title: Decouple Execution from Systems of Record
features.description: Introduce xMatix as an execution layer while keeping existing CRM, ERP, and core systems intact.

features.title: Compose and Automate Workflows
features.description: Use no-code and low-code tools to model workflows, rules, and policies without heavy development cycles.

features.title: Unify Operational Data
features.description: Connect transactional, master, and event data into a shared operational context without large-scale data replication.

features.title: Introduce Governed Autonomy
features.description: Deploy policy-bound, auditable automation and agentic execution that can be monitored and overridden when needed.

ecosystemSection.title: The Problem
ecosystemSection.description: Most enterprise technology landscapes have grown into complex, tightly coupled stacks. Each change requires long implementation cycles, custom integrations, and heavy IT involvement, limiting agility and innovation.

ecosystem.title: Monolithic CRM & ERP Systems
ecosystem.description: Difficult to customise and slow to change, making it hard to adapt processes as business needs evolve.

ecosystem.title: Point Solutions & Integrations
ecosystem.description: Add functionality but increase integration complexity, operational risk, and long-term maintenance overhead.

ecosystem.title: Disconnected Data & AI Initiatives
ecosystem.description: Create insights without shared operational context or control over execution.

ecosystem.title: Governance & Security Constraints
ecosystem.description: Limit automation and innovation due to concerns around auditability, compliance, and risk.
